author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

In [ROOT6](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/buildlogs/el8_aarch64_gcc13/CMSSW_16_0_ROOT6_X_2025-10-15-2300/DataFormats/L1CSCTrackFinder) IBs, the following warning is emitted at dictionary generation stage:

```
[src/DataFormats/L1CSCTrackFinder/interface/L1CSCSPStatusDigi.h:48](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/CMSSW_16_0_ROOT6_X_2025-10-15-2300/DataFormats/L1CSCTrackFinder/interface/L1CSCSPStatusDigi.h#L48):35: warning: first argument in call to 'bzero' is a pointer to non-trivially copyable type 'L1CSCSPStatusDigi' [-Wnontrivial-memcall]
   L1CSCSPStatusDigi(void) { bzero(this, sizeof(L1CSCSPStatusDigi)); }
                                  ^
src/DataFormats/L1CSCTrackFinder/interface/L1CSCSPStatusDigi.h:48:35: note: explicitly cast the pointer to silence this warning
  L1CSCSPStatusDigi(void) { bzero(this, sizeof(L1CSCSPStatusDigi)); }
                                  ^
                                  (void*)
```

This PR replaces (non-standard) `bzero` function with explicit initialization of class members.

#### PR validation:

No warnings emitted during local compilation.
title: L1CSCSPStatusDigi: replace bzero with explicit initialization
